name: Altaria
AbilityText: Prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Altaria by your opponent's Pokemon-ex.
Attack1Text: Does 20 Damage to each Defending Pokemon.

name: Beautifly
AbilityText: As long as Beautifly's remaining HP is 40 or less, Beautifly does 40 more damage to the Defending Pokemon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack1Text: Before doing damage, you may choose 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon and switch it with 1 of the Defending Pokemon. If you do, this attack does 20 damage to the new Defending Pokemon. Your opponent chooses the Defending Pokemon to switch.

name: Breloom
Attack1Text: If Breloom has any Grass Energy attached to it, the Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.
Attack2Text: During your next turn, Hustle Punch attack's base damage is 50 instead of 70.

name: Camerupt
Attack1Text: Search your discard pile for up to 2 basic Energy cards and attach them to your Pokemon in any way you like.
Attack2Text: Choose 2 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 30 damage to each of them. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Claydol
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Claydol is your Active Pokemon, you may shuffle your hand into your deck. Then, draw a number of cards equal to the number of cards in your opponent's hand. This power can't be used if Claydol is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: If Claydol has any Psychic Energy attached to it, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused. If Claydol has any Fighting Energy attached to it, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage.

name: Crawdaunt
AbilityText: Any damage done to Crawdaunt by your opponent's attacks is reduced by 10 for each Darkness Energy attached to Crawdaunt (after applying Weakness and Resistance). You can't reduce more than 20 damage in this way.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokemon is an Evolved Pokemon, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage.

name: Dusclops
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. If both of them are heads, discard all Energy attached to the Defending Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Count the number of cards in your hand. Put that many damage counters on the Defending Pokemon. You can't put more than 7 damage counters in this way.

name: Gyarados
Attack1Text: This attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: Does 20 damage times the number of damage counters on all of your Magikarp.

name: Jirachi
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Jirachi is your Active Pokemon, you may look at the top 5 cards of your deck, choose 1 of them, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward. Jirachi and your other Active Pokemon, if any, are now Asleep. This power can't be used if Jirachi is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: If the Defending Pokemon has any Poke-Bodies, this attack does 20 damage plus 30 more damage.

name: Ludicolo
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may draw a card. This power can't be used if Ludicolo is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: You may discard as many cards as you like from your hand. If you do, remove that many damage counters from Ludicolo.
Attack2Text: Does 10 damage times the number of Pokemon in play (both yours and your opponent's), excluding Ludicolo.

name: Metagross
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your discard pile for a Psychic or Metal Energy card and attach it to your Active Pokemon. Then, put 1 damage counter on that Pokemon. This power can't be used if Metagross is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: If Metagross and the Defending Pokemon have a different amount of Energy attached to them, this attack's base damage is 40 instead of 70.

name: Mightyena
Attack1Text: Search your deck for 1 card and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: If your opponent has 5 or more cards in his or her hand, your opponent discards a number of cards until your opponent has 4 cards left in his or her hand.

name: Ninjask
AbilityText: Prevent all effects, including damage, done to Ninjask by your opponent's attacks from his or her Basic Pokemon.
Attack1Text: During your next turn, Ninjask's Slash attack's base damage is 80.

name: Shedinja
AbilityText: When Shedinja is Knocked Out, your opponent doesn't take any Prize cards.
Attack1Text: Put 2 damage counters on the Defending Pokemon. If the Defending Pokemon is Pokemon-ex, put 4 damage counters instead.

name: Slaking
AbilityText: As long as Slaking is your Active Pokemon, any damage done by attacks from your opponent's Pokemon-ex is reduced by 30 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of the Defending Pokemon's attacks. That Pokemon can't use that attack during your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: Slaking is now Asleep.

name: Deoxys
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for another Deoxys and switch it with Deoxys. (Any cards attached to Deoxys, damage counters, Special Conditions, and effects on it are now on the new Pokemon.) If you do, put Deoxys on top of your deck. Shuffle your deck afterward. You can't use more than 1 Form Change Poke-Power each turn.
Attack1Text: If Deoxys and the Defending Pokemon have a different amount of Energy attached to them, this attack's base damage is 20 instead of 40.

name: Deoxys
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for another Deoxys and switch it with Deoxys. (Any cards attached to Deoxys, damage counters, Special Conditions, and effects on it are now on the new Pokemon.) If you do, put Deoxys on top of your deck. Shuffle your deck afterward. You can't use more than 1 Form Change Poke-Power each turn.
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy attached to all of your opponent's Pokemon.

name: Deoxys
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for another Deoxys and switch it with Deoxys. (Any cards attached to Deoxys, damage counters, Special Conditions, and effects on it are now on the new Pokemon.) If you do, put Deoxys on top of your deck. Shuffle your deck afterward. You can't use more than 1 Form Change Poke-Power each turn.
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to Deoxys by attacks is reduced by 30 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Ludicolo
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may remove 1 damage counter from each of your Pokemon. You can't use more than 1 Happy Dance Poke-Power each turn. This power can't be used if Ludicolo is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin for each Water Energy attached to Ludicolo. This attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage for each heads.

name: Magcargo
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for a card. Shuffle your deck, then put that card on top of your deck. This power can't be used if Magcargo is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: You may discard any Stadium card in play.

name: Pelipper
Attack1Text: During your next turn, if any of your current Active Pokemon does damage to any Defending Pokemon, the attack does 30 more damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack2Text: This attack's damage is not affected by Resistance.

name: Rayquaza
AbilityText: As long as Rayquaza has any basic Fire Energy cards and any basic Lightning Energy cards attached to it, prevent all effects, except damage, by an opponent's attack done to Rayquaza.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage.

name: Sableye
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Sableye is your Active Pokemon, you may look at your opponent's hand. This power can't be used if Sableye is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack2Text: Your opponent can't play any Supporter Cards from his or her hand during your opponent's next turn.

name: Seaking
Attack1Text: Choose 3 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 10 damage to each of those Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokemon already has any damage counters on it, this attack does 30 damage plus 20 more damage.

name: Shiftry
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may switch 1 of the Defending Pokemon with 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. Your opponent chooses the Benched Pokemon to switch. This power can't be used if Shiftry is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: If there is any Stadium card in play, this attack does 50 damage plus 20 more damage.

name: Skarmory
AbilityText: If Skarmory has any Metal Energy attached to it, the Retreat Cost for Skarmory is 0.
Attack1Text: Draw a card.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin for each Metal Energy attached to Skarmory. This attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage for each heads.

name: Tropius
AbilityText: As long as Tropius is your Active Pokemon, your opponent's Active Pokemon have no Resistance.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, choose 1 Special Condition. The Defending Pokemon is now affected by that Special Condition.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage.

name: Whiscash
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage for each damage counter on Whiscash to each Defending Pokemon. If tails, this attack does 10 damage for each damage counter on Whiscash to the Defending Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Does 70 damage minus 10 damage for each damage counter on Whiscash.

name: Xatu
AbilityText: If Xatu is Burned or Poisoned by an opponent's attack (even if Xatu is Knocked Out), the Attacking Pokemon is now affected by the same Special Conditions (1 if there is only 1).
Attack1Text: Each Defending Pokemon is now Confused.
Attack2Text: Does 30 damage plus 30 more damage for each Trainer card your opponent has in play.

name: Donphan
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: This attack's damage is not affected by Resistance.

name: Golbat
AbilityText: Golbat can't be Paralyzed.
Attack1Text: Remove 1 damage counter from Golbat.

name: Grumpig
AbilityText: Grumpig can't be Confused.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokemon is Pokemon-ex, this attack does 50 damage plus 30 more damage.

name: Lombre
AbilityText: If Lombre has any Water Energy attached to it, the Retreat Cost for Lombre is 0.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage.

name: Lombre
AbilityText: When you attach a Water Energy card from your hand to Lombre, remove all Special Conditions from Lombre.
Attack1Text: Remove 2 damage counters from Lombre.

name: Lotad
Attack1Text: Choose 1 card from your opponent's hand without looking. Look at the card you chose, then have your opponent shuffle that card into his or her deck.

name: Lunatone
AbilityText: The Retreat Cost for each Solrock you have in play is 0.
Attack1Text: Look at the top 5 cards of either player's deck and put them back on top of that player's deck in any order.
Attack2Text: Does 20 damage plus 10 more damage for each Solrock you have in play.

name: Magcargo
Attack2Text: If Magcargo has at least 2 Fire Energy attached to it, the Defending Pokemon is now Burned.

name: Manectric
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 20 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: You may do 40 damage plus 10 more damage for each Lightning Energy attached to Manectric. If you do, Manectric does 10 damage to itself.

name: Masquerain
AbilityText: As long as Masquerain is your Active Pokemon, any damage done by an opponent's attack is reduced by 20 (before applying Weakness and Resistance). You can't use more than 1 Intimidating Pattern Poke-Body each turn.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Metang
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy attached to the Defending Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage.

name: Minun
Attack1Text: Put any 1 card from your discard pile into your hand.
Attack2Text: Does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Pokemon that has any Poke-Bodies. Don't apply Weakness and Resistance.

name: Nosepass
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Nosepass is your Active Pokemon, you may flip a coin. If heads, switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon with 1 of the Defending Pokemon. Your opponent chooses the Defending Pokemon to switch. This power can't be used if Nosepass is affected by a Special Condition.

name: Nuzleaf
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Confused.
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage plus 20 more damage for each heads.

name: Plusle
Attack1Text: Search your deck for up to 2 Basic Pokemon and put them onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Pokemon that has any Poke-Powers. Don't apply Weakness and Resistance.

name: Shelgon
AbilityText: Prevent all damage done to Shelgon by attacks from your Pokemon.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage plus 10 more damage.

name: Silcoon
Attack2Text: During your opponent's next turn, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Silcoon by your opponent's Evolved Pokemon.

name: Solrock
AbilityText: The maximum HP for each Lunatone you have in play is now 80.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed. If tails, the Defending Pokemon is now Burned.
Attack2Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. This attack does 10 damage to that Pokemon for each Lunatone you have in play. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Starmie
AbilityText: As long as Starmie has any Psychic Energy attached to it, damage done to Starmie by attacks is reduced by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. This attack does 10 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.) You may move an Energy attached to that Pokemon to another of your opponent's Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy attached to the Defending Pokemon.

name: Swellow
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 20 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.) Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent discards 1 Energy card, if any, attached to that Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, Swellow does 10 damage to itself.

name: Vigoroth
AbilityText: As long as Vigoroth is your Active Pokemon, attacks by each player's Active Pokemon (both if there are 2) do 10 more damage to any Active Pokemon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Weezing
Attack1Text: Put damage counters on the Defending Pokemon until it is 10 HP away from being Knocked Out. Weezing does 70 damage to itself.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned. If the Defending Pokemon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.

name: Bagon
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Burned.
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

name: Baltoy
Attack2Text: Does 10 damage to each Benched Pokemon (both yours and your opponent's). (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.) Baltoy does 50 damage to itself.

name: Barboach
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of the Defending Pokemon's attacks. That Pokemon can't use that attack during your opponent's next turn.

name: Beldum
Attack1Text: Beldum does 10 damage to itself, and don't apply Weakness and Resistance to this damage.

name: Carvanha
Attack2Text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on Carvanha.

name: Corphish
AbilityText: Any damage done to Corphish by attacks is reduced by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

name: Duskull
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Electrike
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent can't play Trainer cards from his or her hand during his or her next turn.

name: Electrike
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Lightning Energy card and attach it to Electrike. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage.

name: Goldeen
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Koffing
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

name: Lotad
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 10 more damage.

name: Magikarp
Attack1Text: Switch Magikarp with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on Magikarp.

name: Makuhita
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing. If heads, discard 1 Energy card attached to the Defending Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 10 more damage.

name: Natu
AbilityText: If Natu is Burned or Poisoned by an opponent's attack (even if Natu is Knocked Out), the Attacking Pokemon is now affected by the same Special Conditions (1 if there is only 1).
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Nincada
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 10 damage to that Pokemon. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance.

name: Numel
AbilityText: Any damage done to Numel by attacks from Evolved Pokemon (both yours and your opponent's) is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Phanpy
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

name: Poochyena
Attack1Text: Choose 1 card from your opponent's hand without looking. Look at the card you chose, then have your opponent shuffle that card into his or her deck.

name: Seedot
Attack1Text: Draw a card.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage.

name: Shroomish
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage.

name: Slakoth
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: Does 10 damage times the number of damage counters on Slakoth.

name: Slugma
Attack1Text: Draw a card.

name: Slugma
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

name: Spoink
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

name: Staryu
Attack1Text: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokemon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokemon, if any. You switch Staryu with 1 of your Benched Pokemon, if any.

name: Surskit
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of an attack, including damage, done to Surskit during your opponent's next turn.

name: Swablu
AbilityText: Whenever Swablu would be damaged or affected by an opponent's attack and already has at least 1 damage counter on it, flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of that attack, including damage, done to Swablu.

name: Taillow
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing. If heads, prevent all effects of an attack, including damage, done to Taillow during your opponent's next turn.

name: Wingull
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage.

name: Wurmple
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a card that evolves from Wurmple and put it on Wurmple. (This counts as evolving Wurmple.) Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, choose 1 Special Condition. Each Defending Pokemon is now affected by that Special Condition.

name: Zubat
AbilityText: Zubat can't be Paralyzed.
